name: travelplans-fun
description: A scalable, secure, role-based portal for Travelplans.fun to manage itineraries, customers, and agents, with analytics and document management features.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp index.html index.tsx metadata.json types.ts package.json server.js firebaseConfig.ts App.tsx build/ && cp -r assets components context data hooks pages build/
